TopicTitle: Made my own part, keeps coming with fuel switch

Articles.Content:
Hey Guys,

I "made" (cough copied cough) my own part just to play with modding. It's a resource converter with a different texture. It looks and works fine with the exception that it keeps adding a fuel switch to the GUI for some reason. I think it is the standard fuel switch or maybe Interstellar? Is there anyway to disable this, it's not in my .cfg file so don;t know where to look.

Thanks!

Well if it's not in your cfg then you have a plugin or a cfg somewhere that is adding it to all of what ever you copied you will have to found what it is.

EDIT- Guess you could look at your log and see what it is

EDIT- you might post you cfg that might help also to know just what you copied and what you might be looking for ?

Edited November 7, 2015 by Mecripp2
I think IFILS adds fuel switch to most tanks via MM.
I've used the code for another similar part and the problem is gone, don't know what was causing it as I could not see any difference in the code.

There is almost certainly a ModuleManager patch, as part of a different mod, which is doing this. If you want to determine which one, please post your output log (see this for how to find that) as well as the name (note: not title!) of the part you are creating.
